mapper.select: select craft_num_pk, craft_name, partner_id_fk, craft_status from craft order by craft_num_pk desc

select craft_num_pk, partner_id_fk, craft_name, craft_mobile, craft_representative, craft_Introduce, craft_career, craft_specialty, craft_post_code, craft_address, craft_detail_address, craft_extra_address, craft_latitude, craft_longitude, craft_status from craft where craft_num_pk = #{craft_num_pk}

select substr(orgFilename, 1, instr(orgFilename,',',1)-1 ) AS craft_image_orgFilename ,substr(orgFilename, instr(orgFilename,',',1, 1)+1, instr(orgFilename,',',1, 2) - instr(orgFilename, ',', 1, 1) -1 ) AS craft_representative_image_orgFilename ,substr(orgFilename, instr(orgFilename,',',1, 2)+1 )AS craft_certificate_orgFilename ,substr(fileName, 1, instr(fileName,',',1)-1 ) AS craft_image_fileName ,substr(fileName, instr(fileName,',',1, 1)+1, instr(fileName,',',1, 2) - instr(fileName, ',', 1, 1) -1 ) AS craft_representative_image_fileName ,substr(fileName, instr(fileName,',',1, 2)+1 )AS craft_certificate_fileName from craft where craft_num_pk = #{craft_num_pk}
select craft_num_pk, craft_mobile, craft_representative, craft_Introduce, craft_career, craft_status from craft where craft_num_pk = #{craft_num_pk}
select admin_id_pk from admin where admin_id_pk=#{userid} and admin_pwd=#{pwd}
